attributes.action: Reduced the noise from the use of fireworks and put a cap on the lengh a display can run. Due to them frightening domestic and wildlife animals, and disturbing our peace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fireworks to be used at organiized site only.
A limited time for firing fireworks at celebrations.
Reduce the decibel limit to a max of 85db.
Illegal to frighten an animal.
To be let off at certain times.
Events to be published in the local news.
Control of the sale.
Restricted the duration of displays to max 3 hours,
No fireworks between celebration.
Fireworks to be sold at certain times of the day.
